committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Conservation and Power

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide that daylight saving time end on the first Sunday of September rather than on the last Sunday of October.

summary.text: Amends the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to end daylight saving time on the first Sunday of September rather than on the last Sunday of October. Continues a State's right to preempt such time changes. Directs the Federal Communications Commission to make necessary adjustments in the operation of daytime standard amplitude modulation broadcast stations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide that daylight saving time end on the first Sunday of September rather than on the last Sunday of October.
